sentences.en: All you need is a microphone, and you're in business.
sentences.cn: 再来一只麦克风，你就万事俱备了。

sentences.en: Armed only with a BBC microphone, I travelled across South Africa meeting writers.
sentences.cn: 仅仅凭借着一支英国广播公司的话筒，我走遍了南非，会见了许多作家。

sentences.en: Cheers greeted Cleveland as he walked to the microphone.
sentences.cn: 克利夫兰走到扩音器跟前,顿时一片欢呼.

sentences.en: He found it hard to work with a microphone pointing at him.
sentences.cn: 他发觉对着麦克风他很难专心工作。

sentences.en: He gave a tap at the microphone before speaking.
sentences.cn: 他在讲话前先轻叩了一下扩音器.

sentences.en: He grabbed my microphone and we tussled over that.
sentences.cn: 他抓住我的麦克风，我们为此扭打起来。

sentences.en: His accident with the microphone brought some welcome comic relief to a very dull party.
sentences.cn: 他撞上了麦克风,这给极沉闷的聚会带来了些欢乐.

sentences.en: I have my microphone with me.
It has separate microphone pickups and amplifiers for each string.
sentences.cn: 每根琴弦都有各自独立的拾音器和放大器.

sentences.en: My hand shook so much that I could hardly hold the microphone.
sentences.cn: 我的手抖得如此厉害，几乎都拿不住麦克风了。

sentences.en: She behaved naturally before the microphone.
She spoke confidently into the microphone.
sentences.cn: 她自信地对着麦克风说话。

sentences.en: The lead singer was prancing around with the microphone.
sentences.cn: 首席歌手手执麦克风，神气地走来走去。

sentences.en: The microphone, you see, acts much like a telephone transmitter.
sentences.cn: 你看, 传声器作用与电话的送话器很相像.

sentences.en: They searched the room for hidden microphones.
sentences.cn: 他们在屋里翻找隐藏的话筒。

sentences.en: They started handing the microphone out round the girls at the front.
sentences.cn: 他们开始把麦克风传给前面的女孩们。

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that you speak into to record your voice or make it louder when you are speaking or performing in public
